org.jasig.cas.persondir

Class LdapPersonAttributeDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.services.persondir.support.BasePersonAttributeDao
      • org.jasig.services.persondir.support.AbstractFlatteningPersonAttributeDao
        • org.jasig.services.persondir.support.AbstractDefaultAttributePersonAttributeDao
          • org.jasig.services.persondir.support.AbstractQueryPersonAttributeDao<org.ldaptive.SearchFilter>
            • org.jasig.cas.persondir.LdapPersonAttributeDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jasig.services.persondir.IPersonAttributeDao
    Deprecated. 
    As of 4.1. Use org.jasig.services.persondir.support.ldap.LdaptivePersonAttributeDao. Person directory IPersonAttribute implementation that queries an LDAP directory with ldaptive components to populate person attributes.

    @Deprecated
public class LdapPersonAttributeDao
extends org.jasig.services.persondir.support.AbstractQueryPersonAttributeDao<org.ldaptive.SearchFilter>
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Marvin S. Addison

      • setSearchFilter

        public void setSearchFilter(String filter)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the LDAP search filter used to query for person attributes.
        Parameters:
        filter - Search filter of the form "(usernameAttribute={0})" where {0} and similar ordinal placeholders are replaced with query parameters.

      • setSearchControls

        public void setSearchControls(SearchControls searchControls)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets a number of parameters that control LDAP search semantics including search scope, maximum number of results retrieved, and search timeout.
        Parameters:
        searchControls - LDAP search controls.

      • setConnectionFactory

        public void setConnectionFactory(org.ldaptive.ConnectionFactory connectionFactory)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the connection factory that produces LDAP connections on which searches occur. It is strongly recommended that this be a PooledConnecitonFactory object.
        Parameters:
        connectionFactory - LDAP connection factory.
